mapper.sql: f.id, f.PROCINSTID AS "procInstId", f.OFFICEID AS "officeId", f.APPLICANTID AS "applicantId", f.status, f.APPLYDATE AS "applyDate", f.BEGINDATE AS "beginDate", f.ENDDATE AS "endDate", f.remark, f.TOTALAMOUNT AS "totalAmount", f.UPDATEDATE AS "updateDate", f.MANAGERFLAG AS "managerFlag", f.FAFlag AS "fa_flag", f.MANAGERCOMMENT AS "managerComment", f.FAComment AS "fa_comment", u.name AS "user.name", o.name AS "user.office.name"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = f.applicantId JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = f.officeId
